Hello Superpadder!

This update is bringing many improvements and news to you, check out the list below:

* Community tab - download and share user-created kits
* Recording - now you can record the audio of your performance
* Super Pads

Hello Superpadder!
This update is bringing many improvements and news to you, check out the list below:

* Community tab - download and share user-created kits

* Improvements
* Improvements

* Search community KITs
* Now you can create with until pages, like a real launchpad
* Improvements

Now you can learn to play in the app! Check out the news:
- Internal tutorials
- New main menu, with kits categories
Keep your Super Pads Lights always updated to get the improvements. This way you’ll have an amazing music experience!

We hope you’re enjoying the app! Please, keep it regularly updated to always have our greatest features and latest improvements:
- New sound packs.
- Bug fixes.
Fixed error with the new Launchpad X and Launchpad mini MK3 connections.

This new version of the Super Pads Lights app has a whole new version of the app. With best performance and best sound quality. The app is now easier for us to bring the best of Super Pads to you.
